page.title: 13RECREATION, POWBURN AREA
page.content:
Although we do not have any cinemas, theatres or museums in our area, there are still quite a lot of things to do in our spare time. There are quite a few children in the Pony Club. This club meets during the Summer. You can learn how to ride and how to jump. Pony Club Camp usually lasts about a week in the Summer holidays.
Quite a few children in our class enjoy going to Choir Practice every week on a Tuesday night. There are nine children in the Choir. There are also Lent Classes. If you want to go to Karate Classes you have to go to Wooler or Alnwick. One boy goes to Alnwick for Mini Rugby on a Sunday. Three children from our class have piano lessons. The piano teacher comes to each person's house.
